name: Disco Dinos
description:
This is like DDR but with a janky penguin. 

Survive by meeting the dinos at the bottom of the lanes and matching their move. Perform your move in the same direction as the dino as it passes. If a dino is spinning and/or jumping, you must also be spinning and/or jumping.

Spin in the middle lane to slowly restore some funk.

All player actions are timed with the beat(except spinning). So if something doesn't happen right when you press the button, you could be off beat(assuming the game is actually working).

For anyone looking for a score to beat, my high score is 415.

Keyboard Controls:
  • A and D - Move left and right
  • Arrow Keys - Dance moves
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Spin
  • 1 2 3 4 - Fast move to said spaces
  • ~ or 0 -  Fast move to disco space
Gamepad Controls:
  • Left Stick or Right Stick - Move left and right
  • DPad - Dance moves
  • South Button(x or a or whatever) - Jump
  • East Button - Spin
  • L2 - Fast move to space 1
  • L1 - Fast move to space 2
  • R1 - Fast move to space 3
  • R2 - Fast move to space 4
  • Left Stick Click or Right Stick Click - Fast move to disco space
Alternate Keyboard Controls (Hard Mode):
  • ~ 1 2 3 4 - Move to numbered and disco space
  • NumPad Arrows - Dance moves
  • NumPad 0 - Jump
  • NumPad Enter - Spin
